DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to learn more about what patients undergoing surgery for thyroid cancer expect from their surgery. Your input may help us to better prepare and inform patients about their disease and its treatment.
DOC.brief_title: Measuring Patient Expectations for Thyroid Surgery
